api_list.name: GET evidence
api_list.description: GET by hash sha256 or TrxId from Blockchain of Bitcoin and Ethereum
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stamping.p.rapidapi.comhttps://api.stamping.io/getstamp/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stamping.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
